resources.string: I confirm that I have read and fully understood the above information.
I confirm that I voluntarily consent to the collection, processing and maintenance of my personal data by Diagnosis for purposes as outlined in paragraph 1 above.
I confirm that I am aware of and understand my rights regarding:

• Purpose of data processingThe purpose S.Y.Diagnosis Laboratory Center Limited (Diagnosis) collects, processes and maintains personal data, is due to our activities in relation to the laboratory tests concerning you.
    • " "
  • Type of personal data that they are or will be subjected to processing
    • Name and Surname
      • " "
    • Date of Birth
      • " "
    • Identity and/or passport number
      • " "
    • Contact details such as address, phone, fax and e-mail.

      • " "
    • Information relating to your previous transactions with the Lab
      • " "
    • Current treatments
      • " "
    • Test results
    " "
  • Update / Saved data
    • " "
    • Our records will be periodically updated in the same way as which information have been collected
    • Your personal data is stored in the secure files in printed and electronic form and kept on our facilities. Only our staff has access to the files. We have security measures installed to ensure the data confidentially and these security measures are subject to constant review and upgrade.
    " "
  • Span of time processingFor the time required to evaluate the current or future state of health or your request to remove your data.
    • " "
  • Legal frameworkAccording to the powers provided by Law 132/1988 for the processing clinical laboratory examinations in patients.
    • " "
  • Recipients to whom the medical data may be releaseAfter your consent the data can be released to your doctor and healthcare professionals who are responsible for your health. Under no circumstances do we expose your personal data to third parties other than your explicit consent.

• the portability of my personal data, the submission of a written request to access and correct my personal data, to limit the processing data or oppose to processing and deleting my personal data
    • " "
  • The revoke of my consent at any time with submitting a written request to the Data protection Officer of Diagnosis, 36 Vasileos Constantinou Street, 8021 Paphos
    • " "
  • Submitting a complaint to the Office of the Commissioner for the Protection of Personal Data:
    " "Address: Iasonos 1, 1082 Nicosia
    " "Phone: 22818456
    " "Fax: 22304565
    " "Email: commissioner@dataprotection.gov.cy

Purpose of data processing The purpose S.Y.Diagnosis Laboratory Center Limited (Diagnosis) collects, processes and maintains personal data, is due to our activities in relation to the laboratory tests concerning you
Type of personal data that they are or will be subjected to processing
Contact details such as address, phone, fax and e-mail.
Information relating to your previous transactions with the Lab
Our records will be periodically updated in the same way as which information have been collected

Your personal data is stored in the secure files in printed and electronic form and kept on our facilities. Only our staff has access to the files. We have security measures installed to ensure the data confidentially and these security measures are subject to constant review and upgrade.
Span of time processing For the time required to evaluate the current or future state of health or your request to remove your data.
Legal framework According to the powers provided by Law 132/1988 for the processing clinical laboratory examinations in patients.

Recipients to whom the medical data may be release After your consent the data can be released to your doctor and healthcare professionals who are responsible for your health. Under no circumstances do we expose your personal data to third parties other than your explicit consent.
the portability of my personal data, the submission of a written request to access and correct my personal data, to limit the processing data or oppose to processing and deleting my personal data
The revoke of my consent at any time with submitting a written request to the Data protection Officer of Diagnosis, 36 Vasileos Constantinou Street, 8021 Paphos
Submitting a complaint to the Office of the Commissioner for the Protection of Personal Data:
